com.skyisland.questmanager.npc

Class SimpleChatNPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.npc.NPC
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.npc.SimpleNPC
        • com.skyisland.questmanager.npc.SimpleChatNPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class SimpleChatNPC
extends SimpleNPC
    NPC that offers a simple message to those that interact with it. SimpleChatNPCs do not support menus (they don't do anything if you click chat menu buttons)
